titleStmt.title: To the honourable the Commons House of England. The humble petition and representation of the officers and souldiers of the garrisons of Portsmouth, Southsea Castle, Southton, Hurst Castle, Poole and Brownsea Castle, Weymouth, the castles, forts and forces in the Isle of Wight, and the garrison of Malmsbury, together with many thousand publique spirited persons of those places and parts adjacent.

notesStmt.note: A petition with six grievances and their suggested remedies. With 48 signatures -- Cf. Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
